live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
53285.summary: Some customers on the East Side of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53285.title: Sept 10 - Winnipeg (East side) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Further issues in the area have been found.  Teams are back on site working towards a resolution.  Thank you for your continued patience.
Power has been restored and services should be restored.  We will continue to monitor.
We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
53131.summary: Some customers in Jasper are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53131.title: Sept 9 - Jasper | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
